entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:00 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 06:51 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of rain early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 05:18 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023
